lines.text: let B , u , l , b , a , s , r be integers
lines.code: int B , u , l , b , a , s , r ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to the length of str
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < str . length ( ) ; i ++ )

lines.text: if str [ i ] i B increment B
if str [ i ] i u increment u
if str [ i ] i l increment l
if str [ i ] i b increment b
if str [ i ] i a increment a
if str [ i ] i s increment s
if str [ i ] i r increment r
print the minimum between B and the minimum between u / 2 and the minimum betwen 1 and the minimum between a / 2 and the minimum between s and the minimum between b and r
lines.code: cout << min ( B , min ( u / 2 , min ( l , min ( a / 2 , min ( s , min ( b , r ) ) ) ) ) ) << endl ;
